about_the_game:
Solve puzzles using insect-like traversal skills through imaginary realm, in which there is no up or down.

Guide mysterious creature in dream world, manipulate the architecture to solve puzzles and find hope instruments. After you wake up, use them to heal the world and escape the never-ending cycle!

Unique type of puzzles

  • main character has no special abilities beside insect-like movement, instead – properties of the space are used to create challenges.

Controls are simple

  • yet complex puzzles are possible.

Non-linear game progression

  • Find more than one exit in a level to unlock multiple next levels.
  • Play or replay any unlocked level in any order.

Playable hope instruments

  • Any intruments and songs you find are not only means of progress in the game, they can be played in the real world.

Adaptive soundtrack

  • audio reflects actions in puzzle levels, while it adapts to overall game progression in real world.
